Title: Dune: Part Two
Review: Villeneuve absolutely delivers. The sandworm riding scene alone is worth the ticket.

Title: When Harry Met Sally
Review: Still the gold standard for rom-coms. That deli scene.

Title: The Holdovers
Review: Loved the dynamic between Paul Giamatti and the student.

Title: Oppenheimer
Review: Dense but rewarding. Three hours flew by.

Title: Paris, Texas
Review: Wim Wenders at his most melancholy. That monologue.

Title: Cocaine Bear
Review: Exactly what you'd expect from the title.
